projects.title: Dynamic FullStack Challenge
projects.description: To address a coding challenge, I developed a system that functions as a developer registry. The backend API supports creating, retrieving, and searching developer records, while the frontend allows users to easily add new records and check existing ones. The project is designed with a focus on functionality, ease of use, and scalability, with optional enhancements such as Docker deployment, and automated testing.
